testsuite.name: solar_edge.SolarEdge Sales and support staff test cases

testcase.classname: solar_edge.SolarEdge Sales and support staff test cases
testcase.name: Create sales request
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Create sales request Given Navigate to the website "https://fa-evzi-test-saasfaprod1.fa.ocs.oraclecloud.com/" ... passed in 3.861s Then Insert in "Username": "QA.001" ... passed in 0.068s And Insert in "Password": "SeFusionTestOC00#@!@&" ... passed in 0.579s And Choose "English language" option ... passed in 0.034s And Click on "Login" button ... passed in 9.218s And Click on "Home" button ... passed in 10.431s When "Sales" button is visible ... passed in 0.055s Then Click on "Sales" button ... passed in 5.106s And Click on "Service Request" button ... passed in 5.051s And Click on "Create Service Request" button ... passed in 5.448s And Insert in "Title": "Sales and Support 2023" ... passed in 4.278s And Click on "Save and Close" button ... passed in 5.131s Then Click on "list arrow" button ... passed in 5.068s And Choose "Open Service Requests Created By Me" option ... passed in 5.125s And Verify that the Service Request has been created ... passed in 0.794s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.classname: solar_edge.SolarEdge Sales and support staff test cases
testcase.name: Permission to create an appointment
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Permission to create an appointment And Click on "Home" button ... passed in 8.684s When "Sales" button is visible ... passed in 0.129s Then Click on "Sales" button ... passed in 5.049s And Click on "Create Appointment" button ... passed in 5.100s And Insert in "Subject": "Sales and Support 2023" ... passed in 2.724s And Click on "Save and close" button ... passed in 5.103s And A message is displayed to the user ... passed in 0.857s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
